text: Patricia Gallerneau (née Sérézat; 9 September 1954 – 7 July 2019) was a French politician. She was a member of the Democratic Movement. She was elected to the National Assembly in June 2017, serving until two days before her death in July 2019. She represented the department of Vendée. She was born in the 20th arrondissement of Paris. Gallerneau died of cancer on 7 July 2019, at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in France Category:Politicians from Paris Category:Politicians from Pays de la Loire Category:People from Vendée
title: Patricia Gallerneau
